remarks: Lemma for ~ ftc2ditg .  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 3-Sep-2014.)
statement:

ftc2ditg.y $e |- ( ph -> Y e. RR ) $.
ftc2ditg.a $e |- ( ph -> A e. ( X [,] Y ) ) $.
ftc2ditg.b $e |- ( ph -> B e. ( X [,] Y ) ) $.
ftc2ditg.c $e |- ( ph -> ( RR _D F ) e. ( ( X (,) Y ) -cn-> CC ) ) $.
ftc2ditg.i $e |- ( ph -> ( RR _D F ) e. L^1 ) $.
ftc2ditg.f $e |- ( ph -> F e. ( ( X [,] Y ) -cn-> CC ) ) $.
ftc2ditglem $p |- ( ( ph /\ A <_ B ) -> S_ [ A -> B ] ( ( RR _D F ) ` t ) _d t = ( ( F ` B ) - ( F ` A ) ) ) $.
$d A t $.
$d B t $.
